verbs.description: x [ARG0: CNN 's non - news hosts] [V: have] [ARG1: a serious hate problem with President Trump] , from Kathy Griffin to Reza Aslan , and now to Anthony Bourdain , the chef who hosts their food / travel show Parts Unknown . TMZ interviewed Bourdain and asked him about being invited to cooking for President Trump and North Korean dictator . Asked what he would serve , Bourdain said " Hemlock . " When reached by Fox News , Bourdain , apparently joking , said that he meant to say “ kale ” instead of poison .
